name: CHASTITY BELT MUSIC
description: Website for the band Chastity Belt. Fans can submit instagram posts to be added to the Fan Art page.  Band members can login through a private page to either post submissions to the public page or delete them.

name: SE7EN
description: Bucketlist app to track and explore things to do before the world ends.  Users can add activities to their bucketlist, see other users' lists, and see a map of all activites.

name: SELLING SUNSET EMPLOYEE DIRECTORY
description: Practice in creating a React app and using state to filter and sort.

name: BUDGET TRACKER
description: Practice in creating a progressive web app and storing data using MongoDb.  User input is saved offline using indexeddb.

name: SEASONS
description: Weather dashboard for Justin Bieber fans.

name: CHEESEBURGER IN PARADISE
description: Practice in MySQL and writing an ORM.
